name: Spellpunk (LvjiangQAQ)
description:
CONTROLS:

Move - WASD, Jump - Space

Fire Spell - Left Click, Swap Spell - Scroll Wheel or 1-4 Keybind

A wizard is launched into a distant cyber-future. To find his way back, he must collect all the spells he lost and use them to traverse this new world. The spell you choose to save at the beginning will determine how the game unfolds. Make your way through the future to bring him back home to the past.

Inspiration: Blade Runner Meets Harry Potter

Drew White: Programmer

Shangyang Min: Programmer

Yuchen Zhang: Artist

Sebastian Garda: Level Designer

Cameron Havlish: Sound Design
